body: I can tell most of y'all didn't play the original ffvii game and just watched advent children and it painfully shows. Y'all realize that cloud was essentially dying from his geostigma in the movie right? He never told tifa and his friends about it cuz he didn't want to worry them, that's why he was so distant. It's apart of his loner character, tifa even calls him out on it in the movie saying he shouldn't go through his troubles alone. Of course he cares and loves tifa, why else did he go through the trouble of starting a delivery business with her and their new bar. Two of the surviving people from nebilhem who grew up together suffering hardships together and you think cloud doesn't care about tifa? Ludicrous. And Tifa would never abandon cloud to be with rude, suspension of disbelief be damned. Sure rude has a crush on her so what, let's not forget he has tried to kill her friends instead of her before. I like a good ntr doujin but atleast have it make sense, or don't idc anymore.

I'm trying to make this canon in my head for FF7 AC and in this case, Cloud would probably have died. Spoilers to anyone who hasn't watched it, but cloud got geostigma which feeds off of your despair or something like that, and Cloud didn't want anything to do with tifa or his friends because he had it. It's not stated whether or not tifa and cloud were together but they adopted Denzel ffs so let's assume they are. Cloud's not really the type to show his emotions (especially in ff7 AC) so he may not look like it, but I'm sure that shit hurt him, and he already has geostigma (which feeds off despair) so him finding this out would worsen it, and it was already pretty bad for him. So yeah this is the bad ending of the series with cloud dying leaving nobody to stop sephiroth from being reborn and summoning meteor again, all because tifa was too fucking horny smh.

Cloud would find them and more than likely kill him, because cloud is a video of game character you control and if I learned anything from the shit of us 2 is that cross country murder trips are fun.

But seriously after she sent him that picture apparently if I were cloud and had the power of cloud I would go and kill each and ever single member of their family and friends before killing them both, because fuck second chances and fuck betrayers.
Imagine getting triggered by a doujin lmao. I fap to it anytime.
